DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Efficacy Synera Patch Compared Naproxen Sodium Epicondylitis Elbow
DOC.detailed_description: The objective single center evaluate safety efficacy Synera ® lateral medial epicondylitis . This open-label , comaparative study study subject randomize one follow group : 1 . Synera patch ® : A single patch apply 4 hour twice daily approximatey 12 hrs apart medial lateral side index elbow 2 . Synera patch ® : A single patch apply 12 hours/day medial lateral side index elbow 3 . Naproxen Sodium : 500mg bid
